评论详情: AutoMet sweater is the best. This is my second purchase and l am sold on the quality as it is well made and worth the money. I am 5”2 so love that it is shorter than most sweatshirts and it is true to size.. l weigh 120 and got M bc l like mine roomy.
Cute Sweatshirt! Color is as shown and fits true to size. Sleeve length is nice and goes over your thumbs easily as shown. Material is good quality and is soft enough for comfort.
Love
Short. It is VERY short.
Not as long as the picture shows

评论概述: I'm short... This is too short
评论详情: 5'1" 135 pounds, ordered a small. It fits but it's too short. Even with high rise jeans, it's too short. It is way shorter than in the pictures. I don't know how that's possible, maybe I have a defective shirt. The quality seems nice otherwise. Will be returning.

I had this sweatshirt on my wish list for ages and finally bought it.  The fit is fantastic and cozy! It looks elevated - a bit cropped (but not belly showing!) and more tailored than a regular pull-over sweatshirt.  I love the half zip - it’s very sturdy and durable feeling. And the thumb holes are perfect - not too noticeable if you don’t want to utilize them but also just the right placement and size if you do.  I wish I would have bought this sooner! I will definitely be ordering more colors!  Size reference: 5’3”, 158 pounds, size large

I rolled my eyes when I read a review that compared these to Lulu. I was wrong, they are sort of comparable. I ordered one and was blown away at how nice it was. Thick, plush and so soft. I got green so it would match with a variety of legging colors, both black, grey & brown.

评论概述: Your new go to sweat shirt!
评论详情: There is not a single negative thing I could say! It’s perfect all around! The sizing and color is true with just that perfect amount of oversized, it’s so warm and thick, and the way you can wear it fully zipped or not is perfect for us versatile girlies! Do yourself a favor and grab this sweater or two! I promise you won’t regret it!
Definitely recommend. The neckline sits a little off at times but overall I would buy again. Cute color very flattering.
After a few washes it still looks like new. The fabric is soft and feels like a good quality.
Soft on the inside and nie thick material. Sometimes I'm weary to buy clothes on amazon bc they are hit or miss. but this one was a hit!
Wearing a cotton shirt & this Sweatshirt  as a jacket was all I needed to keep warm in 4° weather.  Fit is perfect also.
Color, softness and quality

With this weather I've been stocking up on comfy sweaters. This one is perfect for everyday use or for going to the gym. My favorite part is the finger holes because it keeps my hands warm. Sizing is true to the charts, I'm usually a small or medium, and I got the size small which fits perfect, for reference I'm 5' 3" and weigh 120lbs. I want to get many more colors now.

This is a nice dupe sweatshirt. The quality is good. The color is more rosy red than the dark red in the picture, but it's still a pretty color. It's definitely warm and soft. I would recommend if you want a good Lulu dupe without the price.
This is the warmest, coziest sweatshirt I own!

I absolutely love this sweatshirt! It’s incredibly warm, cozy, and perfect for just about any occasion. The fabric is soft but not too thick, so it’s warm without feeling bulky. I’ve been wearing it nonstop—whether I’m lounging at home, running errands, or layering it under a jacket for colder days.  What really makes it stand out is how cute it is! The fit is flattering, and I’ve gotten so many compliments on it already. It holds up great after washing (no shrinking or pilling so far), and it’s become my go-to piece. If you’re looking for a sweatshirt you’ll want to live in, this is it! Highly recommend.

评论概述: Used item with stains and dog hair
评论详情: Absolutely disgusted when I opened the package. These stains are all over the sweater and dog hair. Can't even I literally just wanted to throw it away.

I have several 3/4 zip sweatshirts and this is one of my favorites. It’s true to size and hits me right at the top of my hip bone. For reference I have a long torso. It’s very thick and warm, it’s better quality than the ones I have from Old Navy and VS. I haven’t had problems with the stitching like other reviewers had, and I loved it so much I ordered 2 more in different colors.

评论概述: Great color and quality for price!
评论详情: Exactly as pictured. This is a good purchase!

评论概述: Liked my daughters so much I ordered my own
评论详情: Warm, stylish, comfortable, looks good. Can be warm dressed up or dressed down. Size fits great
I am 5’2”, 125lbs and ordered a small. Love the color. Feels soft and should be warm. But the shape is terrible for me, very frumpy.

This top was beautiful and well made. It was great quality for the price.

This is a super cute jacket, it matches the description but it is not very soft or “ buttery “ at all. It’s stiff and doesn’t feel like it moves with you when you wear it, and though I’ve worn and washed it a bunch now it still is pretty stiff. The sizing is accurate, it’s easy to wash, but if you’re looking for buttery soft, keep searching
Too short. Came to one inch below belly button.  Well-made, good soft fabric, though. Color was a bit muted from images on Amazon, but still attractive.

I’m going to a colder weather soon and needed a sweater that would cover my neck. I like the color, fabric and fit on this one. Great buy for the price too! Recommended!

评论概述: Love, but wish hardware held up better!
评论详情: I’m loving this sweater so far. It’s super soft and the fit looks great. True to size in my opinion. Only thing is that on the second wash, the zipper tab broke off in the dryer. Pretty sad that it had a faulty aspect this quickly as I’ve had it only two weeks.

评论用户: Not what I thought they were. I do not like them
评论详情: They are cropped. Not a full shirt as shown in the picture. I would order a larger size if I knew.
Liked this top. Wore it a couple times. Then after cleaning noticed the zipper was broke. I've tried and tried to attach it but nothing works. Top is useless now.
Received sweater already used-tag removed, stains on sweater and a personal item in the pocket
Beautiful color, decent material but too cropped. Regret buying it

In an attempt to be trendy I bought The grey sweater in a size medium. It’s very soft with a boxy fit. I was expecting it to be a little bit longer than it is. The zipper on the inside is a little scratchy. But overall cute.

This is a such a great sweatshirt! The color was perfect and was incredibly durable for a whole trip around New Zealand. The inside is super soft and comfortable even on a long flight! I got a medium for a tighter fit but would have sized up for a looser fit.
It's a casual top to wear everywhere. Love it has fleece lining
I bought this for two of my granddaughters. They loved them. They keep them very warm. It was a great price.
Color is as shown. Size is good - I am wearing a large. Looks similar to the name brand quarter zips. Very pleased.

I wear this easily every 7-10 days and it’s always in the wash. So cute. Love the casual, slightly cropped look with leggings. This makes me feel pulled together when working from home and running errands or taking the dog out for a walk. I also love the green shade. It’s so pretty on a fair blonde. I’ve considered another color but I have a few of these styles from other brands so probably don’t need one - but I do wear this one the most!

评论概述: Super cute but a little cropped
评论详情: This is such a great adorable sweatshirt but it is a little cropped for those of you that need to know I absolutely love the thumb hole detail and it is a great color if it's true to size, get a little short, and it also has a great kangaroo pocket. Do not order the sweatpants that match them though because they are awful and fit
The color is beautiful, thick and durable, and the pocket is great! Need it in more colors!

I love how this fits! It’s soft and comfortable and hits at the right spot for my waist. I’m 5’3”. My daughter was impressed and told me it’s a gear dupe for a pricier athletic/athleisure brand. I do not dry it when I wash it and it still looks like new.

This is my second color! I’m 5’2” 110lbs, 33AA and I ordered both the coffee grey and dark pink in XXS. They fit perfect! This is a CROP top, and I have a flat chest, so it hits me at my waist. It did ‘shrink’ slightly after I washed and dried it but I like it better! Also, you might want to wash before you wear because the fuzzies will get on your undershirt! The zipper teeth are plastic and the zipper is metal. Love the front pocket and thumb holes - did not want a hood.
It’s very cozy and fashionable!

I would give this sweatshirt a 5 because the first one ( in beige or tan ) I got was perfect and I love it. This is my second one in a different color ( lt grey) and for some reason it is a little shorter than the first one. I would ve liked it to be the same as the beige one I have.
Nice, thick, doesn’t look cheap. Washes well. Shirt but not cropped, fits my long arms. True to size. Not fitted but doesn’t look boxy.
I bought two of these as Christmas gifts and my girl loved them.  I have the same style of sweatshirt that I got at Costco. These seem perfect and plan on buying at least one more for myself.

I am absolutely obsessed with this sweater. I sized up to give it a slight oversized fit and it is perfect. Dress up or dress down. I have repurchased this in several colors and was gifted several for christmas. The fit is perfect for jeans, leggings or a dress. Definitely a must have in my wardrobe.
Perfect cropped sweater for shorter torsos
Soft and nice quality love it!
Soo cute!
This sweater is a perfect dupe for the Lululemon scuba sweatshirt. Super cozy and soft material.
Irritating metal zipper on my chest. Otherwise it's flattering and beautiful
Looks amazing. Fits well. It is not heavy. Keeps you warm. It is very functional!
Good product
It is small and boxy. Not flattering.
I bought as a gift. My sister loves it.
Zipper is plastic and broke on first wash.
I love this pullover. I like the color. The size is perfect.
Love how comfortable it is and the fit! I’ve gotten many compliments.
Great quality. Good zipper. Thick and well structured. Will be using this in the office!
I am 5”3 & weigh 128 pounds. I got a small and it fits perfectly! Not too big and not too snug, just right!
She loves it
Great weight. Loose comfy shirt. I wear a small and ordered a small. Would buy again.
Got a large Love this now i need more colors
I typically wear a small or medium depending on the brand. I decided to try a medium and it was really big! I loved the style and the color. I just suggest sizing down.
Love the color and softness of this jacket!
It provides warmth without heavy winter coat.

I have a long torso and this sweater hits right at my hips. Slightly oversized and has a boxy fit, so I would order your usual size unless you want it very baggy. It’s thick but not overly warm. The neck can zip all the way up to my chin which I love. The arms  are the perfect length. Overall I’m impressed with the quality!
love it more than the scuba lol softer material and a big longer.

评论概述: Love the feel and look of this sweater
评论详情: I love this sweater. The color, the pocket, the zipper oh, and the thumb hole. Win, win, win! I'm 5'3' and bought a large so that it can go over my tummy. I don't know why they insist on making everything crop tops like we all don't have hips and whatnot. Either way, a large for me feels almost (almost) normal length.

I ordered this in the color Red. The shade of red is not like the picture shown online. It really is a more red red. The online photo looks more deep or burgundy red. Other than that it is very nice quality and would buy again. Size was accurate & it is cropped.

Love this lulu lemon dupe sweatshirt. Super comfy and reasonably priced! Multiple colors to choose from, but I went with standard black. The fit is perfect, washes well and still just as soft on the inside. Great quality too!
I wear this all the time and have it in two colors. It is a bit short for me and I have to make sure I wear high waisted leggings or jeans but it's good for the price! Warm too!
This cropped sweatshirt is soft and washes well.

I was really looking forward to this sweatshirt but the marital is cheap and it show any and all piece of lint in a 5 mile radius. Lint brush did not really help - again because the material is not good.
Size was perfect 👌
It is cropped.  It doesn’t advertise as a cropped sweatshirt.  Appears to be decent quality.  Thick, soft just to short.

I like the sweatshirt and it is a good weight, but was surprised at how much the length shrunk after one wash. The width seems similar but the length is much shorter. Had to take off a couple stars because now when I bend or move it shows my back.

评论概述: Have these in so many colors😂
评论详情: This is my favorite cropped sweatshirt!! If you like cropped sweatshirts just do it!! They are true to size, wash and dry well, color is on point. I have them in so many colors!! They are soft and cropped but not midriff showing cropped. So good for all year round, because I am all about showing a little skin, but not in the dead of winter in my area. You can’t lose for the price and quality

This half-zip is cozy and comfy too, for running errands or lounging with your favorite book. Pair it will brown leggings and some Nike dunks in cocoa brown and you are set. I love the soft inside and the oversized cut. It’s not too long or too boxy! This runs true to size. I’m 5’7”, 135# and I got a small.

My friend has this in the same color and I loved it, so I purchased it. I'm normally between a Medium and a Large so I purchased the large knowing that it is a cropped fit. I could have gone with a Medium for sure. I love the cut, zipper and pockets. Will definitely order in other colors. Great quality.

So, I gave 4 stars because it is shorter than I would like. Maybe for some that’s positive but it isn’t what is pictured. I ordered a few sizes up because I likr baggy clothes and it only hits at my hip barely. I still really love the color (not really any gray- its purely a beige color) and it’s very comfortable which is why I bought a second one. It is decently thick, but not super thick which is good because if you’re going from outdoors to indoors you don’t want it super thick or then you’re too hot inside. I haven’t had any pilling issues but they are still fairly new so we will have to see in a few months how they hold up. I do wish it was a tad longer and then it would be 5 stars.
I have this in 3 colors. It is soft, good thickness, and fits well. Good length, not too short for a crop fit. I want to wear these all the time! highly recommend.
Great quality! Fit is perfect and looks adorable! Want to buy in more colors!

评论概述: Soft & comfy but color is off
评论详情: Great quality! So soft,  warm and thick. True to size. Great value when it’s on sale. My only qualm is the “coffeegrey” color is not consistent or a perfect match with their other products, refer to attached photo. The sweats are also from Automet.
So comfy love it

Lulu lemon quality zip! I was really surprised how great this zip up is!! I purchased the grey in a M because I didn’t want it too tight. Quality of fabric Is still in tact after being washed. Highly recommend I want to order in other colors too.
Nice for fall ootd and it’s thick good for cold weather
This is a good dupe for Lulu. Overall good quality for price point. Color is true to picture move washed pullover a few times with no piling. I’ve been happy with purchase.
Thickness of material. Color, fit style
Go one size up if you’re looking for the pictured look.

I had high hopes for this based off of the reviews but will be returning. It is very shirt and boxy. I am 160 lbs and ordered a medium and it barely cleared my belly button but was way too boxy/big to size up. The material is Not the soft scuba style, this is a really heavy scratchy sweatshirt material. It looked cheap and I have a sneaking suspicion would pull easily. I am shocked there were so many good reviews in this, it is a cheap poorly made sweatshirt.

I got this in a size medium, color coffee and love the color and overall boxy shape and fit of this. However, I have a long torso and this is very short on me, the hem hits me right about the belly button. Even when I'm wearing a high rise legging, my sides are still exposed unless I'm wearing a shirt underneath. It's cute and soft and big, but longer would make it better!
I gave this as a gift and the recipient loved it.  Very well made and super cute.
Nice looking, warm, and my wife loves it.
I was worried it wouldn’t be very thick or warm enough but this was very good quality!  Very soft inside too!  Great product I will be buying more colors!
